We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex _asi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_asi = ASI(symbol, limitMove);

// In OnData()
if (_asi.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ASI Current", _asi.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.asi = self.ASI(symbol, limitMove)

# In OnData()
if self.asi.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ASI Current", self.asi.Current);
